definition: (conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items

bu4 gui1 ze2 si4 bian1 xing2

definition: unspoken rules (usually ones that codify improper behaviors such as leveraging guanxi to get favorable treatment, or coercing employees for sexual favors)

sentences.english: This rule nullifies the "little brother" argument.
sentences.chinese: 這條規則否定的“小兄弟”的論點。

sentences.english: Now fortunately this time, it's not speaking role.
sentences.chinese: 時間比較緊，我就不說規則了。

sentences.english: The encoding rules are very flexible and support the representation of data graphs and polymorphism.
sentences.chinese: 編碼規則非常靈活並支持圖形數據和多態的表示。

sentences.english: The activities of Regional Alliances will conform to the Rules for Regional Alliances of ICOM National Committees.
sentences.chinese: 地區聯盟旳活動應遵守自身旳程序規則。

sentences.english: Specify a constraining rule on the text in an element with mixed content.
sentences.chinese: 在具有混合內容的元素的文本中指定一個約束規則。

sentences.english: Building offside tactics is one kind when use regulation and design defends tactics.
sentences.chinese: 造越位戰術是利用規則而設計的一種防守戰術。

sentences.english: X-ray examination showed a permeated destruction in the metaphysis of the bone.
sentences.chinese: 線片顯示長骨幹骺端不規則低密度影。

sentences.english: The cost of non-compliance with industry regulations can be catastrophic.
sentences.chinese: 對於不符合工業規則的代價可能是毀滅性的。

sentences.english: Many buildings are irregular " heteromorphosis" construction.
sentences.chinese: 不少樓房是不規則的“異型”建築。

sentences.english: Abort microspore in crescent or irregular shape. 26.
sentences.chinese: 月牙形和不規則形的敗育小孢子。

sentences.english: andeven those of their own instituting they frequently infringe.
sentences.chinese: 甚至連自己定下的規則也常常違背。

sentences.english: This bloke was breaking the unwritten rules for men.
sentences.chinese: 這個傢伙打破了男人們應該遵守的不成文規則。

sentences.english: (against) Using a cell phone while driving is against the traffic rules.
sentences.chinese: 邊開車邊打手機是違反交通規則的。

sentences.english: That's going to change the rules about how to raise money.
sentences.chinese: 這將改變如何籌募資金的規則。

sentences.english: FINA lays down the rules for international competitions.
sentences.chinese: 國際泳聯負責制定國際比賽規則。

sentences.english: It will generate randomised latitude-longitude pairs at irregular intervals.
sentences.chinese: 它將在不規則的時間間隔內生成隨機的經緯度值對。
